H0.text: through what process has the colorado river created the grand canyon in the usa. Weathering

H1.text: through what process has the colorado river created the grand canyon in the usa. Deposition

H2.text: through what process has the colorado river created the grand canyon in the usa. Tectonic uplift

H3.text: through what process has the colorado river created the grand canyon in the usa. erosion

A4.text: This uplift has steepened the stream gradient of the Colorado River and its tributaries, which in turn has increased their speed and thus their ability to cut through rock

A5.text: This increased the rate of erosion and cut nearly all of the Grand Canyon's current depth by 1.2 million years ago
